data.headline: Nasdaq 100 and S&P 500 futures rise about 0.4%, with Dow up 0.2% in premarket trading, led by tech strength.
bullets: Analog Devices jumps ~7% after an earnings beat, while Cadence Design Systems surges over 7% on strong Q4 and FY26 outlook.
Synopsys gains ~3% after Nvidia discloses a $2B stake; Nvidia, Palantir, Wingstop, and Apple also trade higher.
Palo Alto Networks slides 6–8% on cautious guidance despite beating estimates; Recursion Pharma also weak.
Moderna rallies ~5% after FDA agrees to review its mRNA flu vaccine.
Broader risk appetite supported by softening global inflation, ECB policy shift signals, and Japan’s $36B US energy investment.
Traders eye 2 PM ET FOMC minutes for rate-cut clues, with dip-buying encouraged by a quiet macro backdrop and recent selloff.
